controller.Observable

    controller

    • Uses of Observable in controller

      Classes in controller that implement Observable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractBasicPlayer
      An abstract class that implements the basic function of a music player indipendent from song format
      class  UpdatableObserversManager
      This class manage the observers that implements the interface Updatable This class can be extended from a class that must be oberved from an Updatable object

    • Uses of Observable in controller.groovebox

      Subinterfaces of Observable in controller.groovebox 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  GrooveBoxPlayer
      This rappresent the logic to manage a groove and reproduce them with groove box
      Classes in controller.groovebox that implement Observable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GrooveBoxController
      The implementation of GrooveBoxController This class implements the pattern singleton, so for taking the instance of this class use the method getInstance

    • Uses of Observable in controller.musicplayer

      Subinterfaces of Observable in controller.musicplayer 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MusicPlayer
      A music player is something that take different format song from a playlist and reproduce them This interface extends the interface Player and Observable
      Classes in controller.musicplayer that implement Observable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMusicPlayer
      A basic implementation of a Music Player that manage the main function of a MusicPlayer see also MusicPlayer The classes that extend this abstract class must implement the action to do after the song ending
      class  ClassicMusicPlayer
      A classic music player is a normal music player that at the end of the song goes to the next This class use the basic implementation of a music player defined in the abstract class AbstractMusicPlayer and implements the method of the interface PlaylistFeatureCommand
      class  LoopableMusicPlayer
      An extension of the class ClassicMusicPlayer that add the management of the Loop mode This class implement the interface Loopable

    • Uses of Observable in view.panels

      Classes in view.panels that implement Observable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractControllablePane<C>
      This class represents a Panel that can hold and communicate with the attached controller of type
      class  CmdPane
      This Panels handle a single row of functional Buttons using a wrapper This class implements the Builder Strategy to populates itself
      class  GrooveBoxPanel
      This class rapresents the GUI space for the groovebox Is divided into a controls panel (where are placed various buttons) and a personalized JTable that rapresent the GrooveBox
      class  MusicPlayerPanel
      Personalized JPanel for the PlayerPanel, this class "handles" GUI where are situated the functions for playing and pausing of a chosen song.
      class  PersonalJPanel
      A Personalized White&DarkGrey JPanel, with a personalizable Layout and able to show a TitledBorder
      class  PlayerPanel
      This class rapresents the main player panel, which is divided into 2 other panels: -PlaylistPanel; -MusicPlayerPanel; Both have their specifical functions
      class  PlaylistPanel
      Personalized Panel for the PlayerPanel class, this class the GUI that manages the playlist and the addition and remotion of songs from it.
